title: Stir-fried tofu with date & ginger sauce

ingredients.item: ½ tsp vegan vegetable bouillon powder
½ bunch salad onions, roughly sliced

instructions.step: Thoroughly drain the tofu and press firmly between plenty of kitchen paper until you can’t squeeze out any more water. Tear the tofu into small pieces and toss in a bowl with the five spice. Blend the dates, ginger, bouillon powder, vinegar and 100ml water in a small food processor or blender until smooth.

Heat half the oil in a frying pan or wok and fry the tofu for 5 minutes until browned, stirring frequently. Tip out of the pan. Add the remaining oil, salad onions and mushroom stir-fry to the pan and fry for 3-4 minutes until slightly softened.
Return the tofu to the pan with the garlic and fry for 1 minute. Pour in the bouillon mixture and cook for a further 1 minute, stirring to thoroughly combine. Serve immediately.
